name: GR_D
description:
Navigate your way through a minefield of angry cubes.

HOW TO PLAY:

When you start a new game, you will be presented with the playing map. Click on the box that you wish to begin from.

Your goal is to navigate the map, destroying the evil cubes and collecting their crystalized remains to spend in the shop.

If you step into a trap, you will be held in a 3x3 area for a certain amount of time, with more plentiful waves of enemies being thrown at you.

To "beat" the game:

  • Clear a whole map by revealing all non-trap tiles.
  • Collect enough crystals to unlock every weapon and every buff.

Have fun!
